item.title: Kindy Open Day
item.description: Saturday 19th May from 10am -12pm 17 Camp Mountain Rd, Samford Join us for a sausage sizzle and fun activities! Meet the staff, committee and parents. Let your child explore… play… investigate… have fun… The Samford Community C&K Open Day is all about opening our doors and welcoming families so you can see for yourself how special a C&K community service is. While you’re visiting our centre on Open Day, you can join the waiting list for 2019, 2020, 2021.
